violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text:
@ViralBShah Applying the "Override AutoMerge: ignore blocking comments" won't clear the merge to happen despite the automerge block, unfortunately (assuming that was your intent). You, or someone else with permissions, will have to hit the "merge" button manually on this one. At least as far as I'm concerned, I don't think we have to wait out the full three-day period, as it's pretty much been reviewed to death in the last round.

[noblock]
